channel.title: 317 Server Lost weapon help
channel.description: Hi guys I have a problem here I'm a new coder and i've been messing around with a 317 for about 2 days of coding and what is happening that i JUST realized is when i log out with a dragon scim and log back in, it is gone. I tryed testing this with several wepeons and it seems only to be the dragon scimitar. where and how can i change this?

item.title: 317 Server Lost weapon help
item.dc:creator: @Gpunks3 Gpunks3
item.description:
@Gpunks3 wrote:

Hi guys I have a problem here I’m a new coder and i’ve been messing around with a 317 for about 2 days of coding and what is happening that i JUST realized is when i log out with a dragon scim and log back in, it is gone. I tryed testing this with several wepeons and it seems only to be the dragon scimitar. where and how can i change this?
